title: Who is the tech consultant accused of killing Cash App founder Bob Lee?
description: Prosecutors have described 38-year-old Nima Momeni's alleged slaying of Lee as premeditated. Here's what we know about the suspect so far.

title: A year ago, Musk asked, “Is Twitter dying?” He may have his answer.
description: One year after launching a hostile takeover bid, Elon Musk’s Twitter is a shadow of its former self.

title: The military loved Discord for Gen Z recruiting. Then the leaks began.
description: The U.S. Army knows something about Discord — it runs an official 17,000-member chatroom on the service.
